name: Jupyter-Io
body:
# Jupyter-Io
This project provides some customizations and addons to Jupyter.

## JupyterCustomizations
Provides a `custom.js` with some nifty features ([...](https://github.com/benvarkey/JupyterCustomizations))

## JuVi
Provides an enhanced *Cadence*© *SKILL*© shell using Jupyter's Kernel.

## CodeMirrorSKILL
Provides a *SKILL*© mode for Code-Mirror ([...](https://github.com/benvarkey/CodeMirrorSkill))

### Authors and Contributors
Ben Varkey Benjamin (@benvarkey)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
